name: Sales Analytics MCP
description: Access sales data including revenue, customer information, and transaction history. Perfect for sales forecasting and customer analysis.

name: HR Management MCP
description: Manage employee data, departments, and organizational structure. Query employee records, roles, and performance metrics.

name: Inventory System MCP
description: Track inventory levels, stock movements, and warehouse data. Monitor product availability and supply chain information.

name: Financial Reporting MCP
description: Access financial data including accounts, transactions, budgets, and financial reports. Ideal for accounting and financial analysis.

name: Customer Support MCP
description: Query customer support tickets, interactions, and resolution data. Track customer satisfaction and support metrics.
